debug.doc: Set to turn on debugging of all or particular features of Molten

bool.doc: If true, will turn on all debugging

object.doc: Turn on debugging on individual components

app.doc: Express (or compatible) app to attach listeners to

socket.doc: Socket.io (or compatible) instance to attach listeners to

port.doc: The port number to listen on if no Express app is given

address.doc: The host address to listen on if no Express app is given
